# Harpy
Harpies are an avian human mutation, sprouting feathered wings and ruffled tails.
## Claws And Beaks
Harpies' talons and beaks are pointed and sharp, and their unarmed attacks deal [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage. Unfortunately, their digitigrade legs and sharp talons mean they cannot comfortably wear any footwear.
## Singing Voice
Harpies are capable of singing out a tune on the spot with their voice, allowing for you to play music with any instrument wherever you are, as long as you aren't muffled!
## Natural Flight
Harpies can fly with their wings to increase their movement speed dramatically, at the cost of heavy stamina drain and a temporary inability to use their hands. Their wings also give them better acceleration if there is no gravity on the station, but they still can't move without equipment when floating out in space. Finally, Harpies cannot set off landmines or cut their feet on shards of glass!
## Sensitive Lungs Harpies have sensitive lungs. This causes them to breathe [color=#1e90ff]3 times faster[/color] than other species and gasp when there is 0.2 combined mols of either miasma or CO2 in the air.
## Damage Harpies take 15% more [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color], [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage due to their hollow bones and avian physiology.
